Package tests

Class PostTest

java.lang.Object
tests.PostTest
public class PostTest extends Object

Title: PostTest Class

Description: This public class supports the actions to test post's. This includes post creation, author validation, title validator,content validator, and update post. In this case, there are 8 methods, all method calls start by calling main(String[] args). There is one constructor, and no attributes for this class.

      Throws:

    • assertString

      public static void assertString(String expected, String actual)

      Method: public assertString(String expected, String actual)

      Description: This method is called when a method in this class wants to compare two strings, if they are the same, nothing happens; otherwise, an error is thrown.

      Parameters:
      expected - is the string that is expected to be the correct String for a method's test such as the expected title.
      actual - is the string that the actual String for a method's test such as the actual title related to a post object.
      Throws:
      AssertionError - - if the actual and expected is not the same

    • assertNotNull

      public static void assertNotNull(Object object, String message)

      Method: public assertNotNull(Object object, String message)

      Description: This method is called when a method in this class wants to confirm an object is not null. If it is null, an error is thrown.

      Parameters:
      object - is the object to be checked.
      message - is the error message that should be thrown.
      Throws:
      AssertionError - - if the object is null
